title: The crypto bill is falling apart in Congress
full_text:
The crypto bill is falling apart in Congress. Hello and welcome to Regulator, the Verge newsletter about the technology politics happening in our nation's capital. I hope our snowstorm-affected readers are safe, warm, and haven't reenacted The Shining at home yet. Do you know what prevents that? Subscrib….
The crypto bill is falling apart in Congress What was supposed to be a bipartisan foundation for cryptocurrency trading is quickly crumbling under hyperpartisan… [+19302 chars]
